requestTitle.message: <error>Error:</error> Which preprint would you like reviewed?

useDoiUrl.message: Use the preprint DOI or URL.

whatIsDoiText.message: A <doi>DOI</doi> is a unique identifier that you can find on many preprints. For example, {example} or {exampleUrl}.

errorEnterPreprint.message: <error>Error:</error> Enter the preprint DOI or URL

unsupportedPreprintTitle.message: Sorry, we don’t support requests for this preprint

unsupportedDoiTitle.message: Sorry, we don’t support this DOI

unsupportedUrlTitle.message: Sorry, we don’t support this URL

unsupportedPreprintMessage.message: We don’t support requests for this {server} preprint yet.

supportPreprintsFrom.message: We support preprints from Advance, AfricArXiv, Arcadia Science, arXiv, Authorea, bioRxiv, ChemRxiv, Curvenote, EarthArXiv, EcoEvoRxiv, EdArXiv, engrXiv, Jxiv, medRxiv, MetaArXiv, OSF, PhilSci-Archive, Preprints.org, PsyArXiv, PsychArchives, Research Square, SciELO, ScienceOpen, SocArXiv, TechRxiv, VeriXiv and Zenodo.

isAPreprint.message: If this is a preprint, please <contact>get in touch</contact>.

doiContactUs.message: If this DOI is for a preprint on a server we don’t support, please <contact>get in touch</contact>.

urlContactUs.message: If this URL is for a preprint on a server we don’t support, please <contact>get in touch</contact>.

tryDoi.message: Otherwise, if the preprint has a DOI, please try using that instead.
